ygData.subject: Re: mana  ****spoilers******
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/8/99 11:12:19 AM EST, mata_eq@hotmail.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/8/99 11:12:19 AM EST, mata_eq@... writes:

<< but what is this book I see all the higher
up have? Can you give us the scoop? What is the avg price for the INT
earings?
>>
as an owner of both heres my guess

Book is +4 int +30 mana you put in your primary hand and canot equip a weapon
only the book or a weapon

If you could buy this book it would most likely be in the 500+ PP range it is
a rare spawn off najena

the earings probably would go for around 50pp (though I have never seen them
for sale) kinda rare also though you probably could get them in a day at
gnoll camp in unrest they come from embalmers.

Zakrell Lu'Dan
Tunare
